entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:05 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 6:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -3.7°C
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to rain this evening then to flurries near midnight. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 110 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence early this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023
